title: Orlando Duque
description: Our Colombian Ambassador started by diving into swimming pools before becoming a true legend of his sport.

slides.title: Orlando Duque
slides.content: Our Colombian Ambassador started by diving into swimming pools before becoming a true legend of his sport. Orlando began cliff diving in 1995 and became a professional cliff diver in 2000. He won 9 cliff diving championships and set 2 world records in his entire career before retiring in 2019. He has always been doing incredible performances and is one of the only cliff diver who got a perfect 10 during a cliff diving competition in 2000.

slides.title: Discipline
slides.content: Orlando Duque is a cliff diver and one of the best in his sport worldwide.

slides.title: Fun Facts
slides.content:
- Orlando won the first ever Gold medal in the sport at the 2013 World Aquatics Championships in Spain
- In 1992, he qualified for the Olympics but wasn’t able to compete because of lack of money at the Colombian Olympic Federation
- He is known as the ‘Duke’ for his outstanding records.
